box1.name: Majuli Assam
box1.description: 1Mājuli or Majoli is a river island in the Brahmaputra River, Assam and in 2016 it became the first island to be made a district in India.Mājuli is 20 km from Jorhat. The culture here is an one of a kind to be experienced. One can take the bus or a hired taxi to the Nimati Steamer Ghat from where ferry services ply. The distance takes over three hours to cover, with three bus rides and two ferry rides.
